item.title: Help with Bank Booths
item.dc:creator: @Z0D14C Z0D14C
item.description:
@Z0D14C wrote:

Im using source devolution,
Now, i just made some global objects (bank booths). Now i click on them and they don’t open
I got the void

public void oub() { sendFrame248(5292, 5063); resetItems(5064); IsBanking = true; }

So then i add this

if (objectID == 2213 && objectX == 2610 && objectY == 3095) { oub(); } if (objectID == 2213 && objectX == 2611 && objectY == 3095) { oub(); } if (objectID == 2213 && objectX == 2613 && objectY == 3095) { oub(); }

Save and compiled, and still the booths don’t open the bank, instead i have to talk to the banker to open booths,
which is a pain in the ass tbh. How can i make it so booths open.

Read full topic
